General_Description: '''Rightful King''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''You have come so far, your training is nearly complete. With shining strength in hand, you will seek victory. Take the path north up [[Mount Taygetos]] and you will find me at its snowy summit, where stone turns weak.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving located to the side of a sword sticked at the snowy summit of the [[Mount Taygetos]].
Section_Behind_the_scenes:
During the engraving recovery, Kassandra claimed that the best veiws of all the Greek world were found there, gifting the [[Mount Olympos]] to the Gods.

The [[Ainigmata Ostraka]] that climbing to the top alone was the final stage to be rightfuly a king of Sparta.

The sword stuck in the rock and the Ainigmata Ostraka riddle is a gesture to the fantasy story of King [[Arthur]] and [[Excalibur]] legend.
Section_References:
